metadata.title: CVE-2019-9764 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul 1.4.3 lacks server hostname verification foragent-to-agent TLS communication. In other words, the product behaves as ifverify_server_hostname were set to false, even when it is actually set totrue. This is fixed in 1.4.4.

criterions.comment: consul package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
